Connect your Podio account to automate w: Connect your Podio account to automate workspace management and item operations.
Create a new record in a Podio app with: Create a new record in a Podio app with specified field values.
Update an existing record in a Podio app: Update an existing record in a Podio app with specified field values. Only provided fields will be updated.
Add a new task to an item or workspace w: Add a new task to an item or workspace with due dates, assignees, and attachments.
Modify an existing task's details or sta: Modify an existing task's details or status. Only specified fields will be updated.
Upload and attach a file to an item/task: Upload and attach a file to an item/task/comment.
Post a comment on an item or task.
Add a status to an item or workspace str: Add a status to an item or workspace stream.
Retrieve a single item by ID or field va: Retrieve a single item by ID or field value.
Retrieve a task by ID for further update: Retrieve a task by ID for further updates.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Make a custom API call to a specific endpoint
Select an organization to filter apps by: Select an organization to filter apps by workspace. Leave empty to see all apps.
Select a workspace to filter apps. Leave: Select a workspace to filter apps. Leave empty to see all apps in the organization.
The external id of the item. This can be: The external id of the item. This can be used to hold a reference to the item in an external system.
Configure values for the fields in the s: Configure values for the fields in the selected app
Advanced: Use this for complex field con: Advanced: Use this for complex field configurations. Format: {"field_id": {"value": "content"}}. Only use if the dynamic fields above don't meet your needs.
Temporary files that have been uploaded: Temporary files that have been uploaded and should be attached to this item
The tags to put on the item: The tags to put on the item
Optional reminder on this item. Format:: Optional reminder on this item. Format: {"remind_delta": minutes_before_due_date}
The recurrence for the task, if any. For: The recurrence for the task, if any. Format: {"name": "weekly|monthly|yearly", "config": {...}, "step": 1, "until": "date"}
The linked account to use for the meetin: The linked account to use for the meeting
The reference for the new item, if any. Format: {"type": "item", "id": reference_id}
If false, webhooks and integrations will: If false, webhooks and integrations will not be triggered for this operation
If true, notifications will not be trigg: If true, notifications will not be triggered and the object will not appear in activity streams
Configure values for the fields you want: Configure values for the fields you want to update in the selected app
The revision of the item that is being u: The revision of the item that is being updated. Optional for conflict detection.
The new external_id of the item: The new external_id of the item
Manual field configuration using field_i: Manual field configuration using field_id or external_id as keys. Use this for advanced scenarios or when dynamic fields are not sufficient.
The linked account to use for meetings: The linked account to use for meetings
The reference of the item. Format: {\"ty: The reference of the item. Format: {"type": "reference_type", "id": reference_id}

Whether the task should be private (only: Whether the task should be private (only creator, assignee and assignor can see it)
Due date in local time (date only): Due date in local time (date only)
Due time in local time (HH:MM:SS format,: Due time in local time (HH:MM:SS format, e.g., "14:30:00")
Complete due date and time in UTC. Alter: Complete due date and time in UTC. Alternative to separate date/time fields.
The type of object to reference: The type of object to reference
Select the specific object to reference: Select the specific object to reference
Who is responsible for this task. Can be: Who is responsible for this task. Can be a user ID (number) or contact identifier object with type and id.
List of file IDs to attach to this task: List of file IDs to attach to this task
List of label names in text form: List of label names in text form

The new due date for the task (in users: The new due date for the task (in users timezone)

Mark the task as completed or not comple: Mark the task as completed or not completed
The user ID of the person responsible fo: The user ID of the person responsible for this task
The labels for the task. Either a list o: The labels for the task. Either a list of label ids or label texts
The list of files that should be attache: The list of files that should be attached to the task

Automatically invite mentioned users to: Automatically invite mentioned users to the workspace if they lack access
